DOC.brief_summary: This study will obtain data from urine in subjects administered 18F-AV-1451 in an Avid-sponsored study to augment the calculation of radiation dosimetry estimates.
DOC.criteria: Subjects who passed screening in an Avidsponsored study in which 18FAV1451 will be administered Subjects who have withdrawn informed consent Investigator or sponsor believes it is in the best interest of the subject to be removed from the trials
